propertyTemplates.propertyLabel: Let's start by entering some strings. Are you able to indicate what language these are in? Did you have any trouble entering diacritics or non-Roman characters?

Profile.title: Profile for Sinopia user feedback
Profile.description: Includes only properties related to user feedback questionnaire
Profile.author: Christine Fernsebner Eslao (eslao@fas.harvard.edu)
Profile.remark: Not for production purposes. This template exists solely for testing user interface elements in Sinopia. RDF output may not adhere to the expected model in all cases.
